text: Apples was a municipality in Switzerland. It is in Vaud Canton. Vaud Canton has 364 communes in it. On 1 July 2021, the former municipalities of Apples, Bussy-Chardonney, Cottens, Pampigny, Reverolle and SÃ©very merged to form the new municipality of Hautemorges.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 16 August 2021 == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Aerial views of the municipality * Commune de Apples - VD - Suisse . communal.ch. title: Apples, Vaud
